title: LFM - Looking for a JG main in High Silver to Low Gold.
body:
This position means there will be three people in our ranked queues. 
IGN - Squshymoshi

replies.body: i would like to say. that i just played a game with this guy. when he was asking for a ADC to play with him. he doesnt understand the fact of teamwork in the game. the people that were in the game just started in abuse and insult everyone and everyone blames everyone for there own mistake. i do not recommend playing with this person. as i beieive he will just drag u down to his level. so my advise is its not worth the LP lose
Silver 2 Jungle main Kha'Zix, Rengar, Gragas and Hecarim

I am a Silver 1 Nidalee jungle main.
IGN: RedNalick
